code: var addPost='ADD-POST';var updatePost='UPDATE-POST';var initialState={postData:[{id:1,message:"Hi, how are you?",like:5},{id:2,message:"It's my first post",like:6},{id:3,message:"and my second post",like:10}],newPostText:''};var profileReducer=function profileReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var active=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(active.type){case addPost:var newPost={id:4,message:state.newPostText,like:0};state.postData.push(newPost);state.newPostText='';return state;case updatePost:state.newPostText=active.updateData;return state;default:return state;}};export var addPostCreate=function addPostCreate(){return{type:addPost};};export var updatePostCreate=function updatePostCreate(text){return{type:updatePost,updateData:text};};export default profileReducer;
